cells.data:
#### git stash

- git stash [ pop | applay ]
- git list
- git clear


#### add remote branch
- git remote add pb https://github.com/paulboone/ticgit  对应简写 和完整url
- git remote -v
- git fetch pb[remote-name]

#### git push
- git push [remote-name] [branch-name]
- 查看这个分支的信息 git remote show origin

#### git fetch
git pull = git fetch + merge to local
